name: Angel Blade
introduction: It's jungle out there. I will no longer be kind in a world of evil. Against enemies who cannot be influenced by heart, it is a good choice to use violence against violence. Let's go, Angel Blade!

awakening_skills.description: Deals an extra 100% DMG to all enemies
Make 1 more teammate enter [Excite] state, which deals 40% Crit DMG additionally
ATK+10%, CRIT+10% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, Conqueror of Legends, and friends battle)
